			[1609] tabpanel 'Details'
				[1615] separator '', orientation='horizontal'
				[1616] heading 'Product Description'
				[1624] image 'night vision scope', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/68cf28a6-0c14-4330-9c94-37cbdd1c3560.__CR0,0,970,600_PT0_SX970_V1___.jpg'
				[1626] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Explore The World, Day and Night'
				[1628] paragraph ''
					StaticText "If you're looking for an affordable, effective and fun way to explore the outdoors in the dark, our night vision is a perfect choice. 5x optical zoom and 8x digital zoom enable you to see clearly up to 220 yards at night. Don’t let darkness stop you from seeing the world around you!"
				[1631] image 'Night Vision Monocular', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/e1266ade-e106-4479-b02e-d77b2cfa2924.__CR0,0,970,600_PT0_SX970_V1___.jpg'
				[1633] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'The'
					StaticText 'ACPOTEL NV01'
					StaticText 'Night Vision Monocular is compact and lightweight; it has a broad vision view, clear image, and easy to carry advantages; it is your best choice for hunting, bird watching, hiking, etc.'
				[1635] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'PACKAGES:'
				[1637] paragraph ''
					StaticText '1 x Digital Night Vision, 1 x 8GB Memory Card , 1 x USB Cable , 1 x Microfiber Cleaning Cloth , 1 x Objective Lens Shelter , 1 x External Power Adapter , 1 x Carrying Case , 1 x Lithium Battery , 1 x Hand Grip Strip, 1 x Shoulder Strip, 1 x Instruction Manual'
				[1645] image 'ACPOTEL NIGHT VISION MONOCULAR', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/1dc8c303-0a48-4e67-b186-8803523f400f.__CR0,0,300,400_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
				[1648] paragraph ''
				[1651] image 'ACPOTEL Night Vision HD Scopes', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/7e93c9e2-3b7a-42df-ad1f-e5d9ef39296e.__CR0,0,350,175_PT0_SX350_V1___.jpg'
				[1653] heading 'Specifications'
				[1656] list ''
					[1657] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Magnification: 5x'
					[1660] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Digital Magnification: 8x'
					[1663] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Observing Distance (Full Dark): 2.18~218Yards'
					[1666] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Sensor: Low illumination HD 1/3 COMS'
					[1669] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Pixel: 130W'
					[1672] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Photo: 1280x1024'
					[1675] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Video: 720P'
				[1679] heading 'NV01 Night Vision Monocular Features'
				[1683] list ''
					[1684] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'HD Image: The monocular uses all-optical glasses and FMC coating, it has about 99.9% light transmittance.'
					[1687] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Available Daytime & Nighttime: It adopts a low-light HD 1/3 COMS sensor, makes it recognize darker light, and also has energy-saving than using the booster tube.'
					[1690] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Rechargeable: It comes with a rechargeable lithium battery and you can charge quickly by connecting the 3.7V/700mAh adapter or computer with a USB cable.'
					[1693] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Auto Shut Off: The night vision device will be turned off if there is no operation within 180 seconds, you don’t always have to worry about it running out of power.'
					[1696] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Portable: The monocular only weighs 0.66lb and has a compact design, you can quickly store it in a super quality storage bag.'
				[1710] table ''
					[1711] rowgroup ''
						[1712] row ''
							[1713] columnheader 'night vision telescope'
								[1715] paragraph ''
									[1716] image 'night vision telescope', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/c00b7f2a-2a17-45ef-ac9a-db96852c94e7.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
							[1718] columnheader 'HD Monocular'
								[1720] paragraph ''
									[1721] image 'HD Monocular', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/36a88330-2ec0-4d55-9604-ad7300e37d61.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
							[1723] columnheader 'mini telescope'
								[1725] paragraph ''
									[1726] image 'mini telescope', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/b97fa255-3c3e-473a-890b-eef0d1248ef7.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
						[1728] row ''
							[1729] cell 'Record and Capture Videos By utilizing the 1/3 COMS sensor, you can capture high-definition video and images day or night with the push of a button. Come with an 8GB TF card, you can capture about 10,000 images in 1280x1024 resolution, or 3 hours of 720p video.'
								[1731] heading 'Record and Capture Videos'
								[1732] paragraph ''
									StaticText 'By utilizing the 1/3 COMS sensor, you can capture high-definition video and images day or night with the push of a button. Come with an 8GB TF card, you can capture about 10,000 images in 1280x1024 resolution, or 3 hours of 720p video.'
							[1733] cell 'High-Quality Monocular All-optical glass lenses with 5X optical zoom and 8X digital magnification, provide the best identification of observed objects. To ensure key elements of an optical device, make your view brighter clearer, and deliver crisp images.'
								[1735] heading 'High-Quality Monocular'
								[1736] paragraph ''
									StaticText 'All-optical glass lenses with 5X optical zoom and 8X digital magnification, provide the best identification of observed objects. To ensure key elements of an optical device, make your view brighter clearer, and deliver crisp images.'
							[1737] cell 'Light & Compact Design You can easily move around with the lightweight monocular, fitting in the palm of one hand. Thus easier to carry about as well as pack away. This monocular is ideal for most nighttime wildlife observation as well as home, farm, and industrial security needs.'
								[1739] heading 'Light & Compact Design'
								[1740] paragraph ''
									StaticText 'You can easily move around with the lightweight monocular, fitting in the palm of one hand. Thus easier to carry about as well as pack away. This monocular is ideal for most nighttime wildlife observation as well as home, farm, and industrial security needs.'
				[1754] image 'wildlife monitoring scope', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/6f0a5b67-005a-4913-93d6-8a13f0ebd2c2.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
				[1757] heading 'Wildlife Monitoring Night Vision Monocular'
				[1758] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Built-in infrared illuminator, the visual range can reach 218 Yards when there is light; it is used in the daytime or at night. Excellent Performance when observing moving targets.'
				[1783] image 'wildlife monitoring scope', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/6f0a5b67-005a-4913-93d6-8a13f0ebd2c2.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
				[1785] paragraph ''
				[1788] image 'monocular telescope for smartphone', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/0aba89cf-2577-4bd0-b16f-998553006c04.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
				[1790] paragraph ''
				[1793] image 'Acpotel monocular', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/6bee6a63-88d7-4012-ae66-44a2301b2993.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
				[1795] paragraph ''
				[1798] image 'monoculars for adults', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/0e42a71a-449e-4ddc-bc79-733e68b84b65.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
				[1800] paragraph ''
				[1805] image 'hunting night vision', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/b5eefdfb-a5a2-45f8-9af6-fca9a28d4124.__CR0,0,970,600_PT0_SX970_V1___.jpg'
				[1809] heading 'Product Quick Look'
				[1812] list ''
					[1813] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'HD IMAGES: Take clearer photos and videos due to the superior light transmission offered by this ir night vision device. The night vision is equipped with a low-light HD 1/3 CMOS sensor, all-optical glass lenses and BAK4 FMC broadband coating. It is easier to catch dark light and more power-efficient than a night vision device using a booster tube. When out in the wilderness at night, avoid the risk of sudden power failure and easily observe your targets.'
					[1815] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'LONG VIEWING DISTANCE: The digital night vision has a fixed 5x optical magnification and up to 8x digital magnification, as well as a built in 850NM Infrared Illuminator. During daytime, clearly observe up to 1000m. During nighttime and other dark conditions, clearly observe the license plate number of a parked vehicle at 200m.'
					[1817] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'RECHARGEABLE & ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY: The infrared night vision is equipped with a rechargeable lithium battery. The battery can be charged via connecting a 5.0V/1000mAh adapter or connecting the computer through the USB cable. Easily view photos, videos and real-time shooting on the PC. With the extra 8GB memory card, store about 3 hours of 720P video or about 10,000 photos of 1280x1024 pixels.'
					[1819] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'LIGHTWEIGHT & MULTIPLE FUNCTION: The mini night vision device uses the international standard guide rail standards, it’s compact and lightweight, only weighs 0.66lb. You can store it easily with the super-quality storage bag and it is perfect for outdoor activities/patrol detection/security surveillance/search & rescue; such as hunting, hiking, bird watching.'
					[1821] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText '100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Buy now and start using the ACPOTEL hd night vision monocular and feel secure that this order is covered by our 30-Day Full Refund. We also offer you an 18-Months Replacement Warranty and lifetime technical support. If you have any question about ACPOTEL products, please contact us.'
				[1824] table ''
					[1825] rowgroup ''
						[1826] row ''
							[1827] rowheader 'Product Dimensions'
							[1828] cell '7.09 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches'
						[1829] row ''

							[1831] cell '0.704 ounces'
						[1832] row ''
							[1833] rowheader 'Batteries'
							[1834] cell '1 Lithium ion batteries required.'
						[1835] row ''

							[1837] cell 'January 9, 2020'
						[1838] row ''
							[1839] rowheader 'Manufacturer'

step_data.thought: From the current page, I can see that the 'Add to Cart' button is already present and available for the ACPOTEL Night Vision Monocular. The previous action was to click on the 'Add to Cart' button, which should have added the item to the shopping cart. Since the 'Add to Cart' button is already focused and clickable, the next action is to check if the item has been successfully added to the cart or navigate to the cart to verify.
